title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in Java Editor Ruler (Photon)
OB: When opening a Java editor and right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, a menu should pop up to add breakpoints/marks, etc. However, no menu is appearing as expected.
EB: Upon right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor, a popup menu should appear, allowing users to add breakpoints, marks, etc.
SR:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right-click on the left vertical ruler. This action should trigger a popup menu to add breakpoints, marks, etc., but it is not happening as expected.
